dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1707 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 302 East Green Street in Champaign, Illinois, as the “James R. Burgess Jr. Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 302 East Green Street in Champaign, Illinois, as the James R. Burgess Jr. Post Office Building.

section.header: James R. Burgess Jr. Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 302 East Green Street in Champaign, Illinois, shall be known and designated as the James R. Burgess Jr. Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the James R. Burgess Jr. Post Office Building.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives June 17, 2014.
